# SVAR_R

The purpose of this repository is to restore and make the SVAR model outputs tidy and organized.

The structure of this repository is:

* code

    The source code
    
* data

    The raw data
    
* JupyterLab

    The `.ipynb` file
    
* result

    pdf report
    
* seeds

    The IRF and 95% C.I. for each identification
